content.title: Our Solution
content.subtitle: Rahat Anticipatory Action (AA) is an open-source, blockchain-powered platform that enables aid agencies to deliver proactive assistance before disasters strike in the form of cash or in-kind. It uses weather oracles to automate alerts and aid distribution through smart contracts,  ensuring support reaches vulnerable communities instantly, transparently, and efficiently once specific disaster thresholds are met.
content.subtitle2: By streamlining operations, reducing overhead, and providing real-time visibility into fund flows, Rahat AA helps humanitarian organizations act faster and more effectively. It empowers at-risk populations to prepare, protect, and recover before a crisis escalates. Built to overcome the delays and fragmentation of traditional aid systems, Rahat offers a scalable, tech-forward solution for anticipatory humanitarian action.
